posts.title: 2022: Yearly Review
posts.author: Blessing Boaslah
posts.hook: Hello, allow me to delve into what my 2022 has been like, and the lessons I've learned. Hopefully you'd find something that you can relate to.

posts.title: Perfection Does Exist
posts.author: Blessing Boaslah
posts.hook: We'd all agree that 'perfection' doesn't exist, but guess what? I think I found out something. Hear me out.

posts.title: Making The World Better
posts.author: Blessing Boaslah
posts.hook: Oh, our World! What a mess we've made, right? Could it get better? Can we fix this? Let's find out together.
